Title: Micro Pattern Evolution
Elements_risk_assessment: we can find out when the problematic lines were initially added.
UseOF-SZZ: Bug-introducing changes are identified by mining change logs and project history data
Summary:
They observed the micro pattern evolution properties of three open source projects, including frequencies of micro 
    patterns, common micro pattern evolution kinds, and bug-prone micro patterns
Outcome:
The micro pattern distributions and common change kinds of analyzed projects are similar.
    The bug rates of patterns of different projects are somewhat similar
